item.title: MY BOOKS
item.description: Updated 4-may-2015 / The read section is still incomplete Wish list Type Title Self Development Quiet: The Power of Introverts in a World That Can’t Stop Talking Technical Agile Principles, Patterns, and Practices in C# Currently reading Type Title Management and leadership The Tipping Point Technical Software in 30 Days: How Agile Managers Beat the Odds, Delight Their Customers, And Leave Competitors In the Dust Read* *Incomplete list, most of the technical books are missing at the moment

item.title: My Stuff
item.description: My current setup for work & play consists of : Desktop Processor 4th gen Intel® Core™ i7-4790 RAM 24 Gb @ 1600Mhz Video NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 720 1GB DDR3 Storage Samsung 850 EVO 250GB 2.5-Inch SATA III Internal SSD Monitor 2x 24” Dell E248WFP (1920 x 1200) Keyboard Microsoft Natural Keyboard 4000 Mouse Microsoft SideWinder X5 Main Os Latests build of Windows 10 Laptop Processor 4th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-4600U (4MB Cache, up to 3.

item.title: Podcasts
item.description: This are the podcast i’m currently listening / viewing. If you don’t know what is a podcast i’m sure wikipedia explains it but basically are like radio / TV shows that i download to my computer and take with me on an iPod or other device to enjoy them where and when i like to. I listen to the audio podcasts when i commute to my work and when i workout in the gym.
